about_the_game:
Waste Walkers

Role Playing Game DLC:
  • Continue To Play The Game - Without Needing A Computer And With Friends!
  • Role Playing Rulebook - Play The Game How It Was Originally Created! (Similar To Other Tabletop Role Playing Games)
  • A Total Of 12 Different Texts With Rules, Weapons, Armor, Equipment, Enemies, Background Stories, And More!
  • All Files Are In Text Format For Easy Access And Easy Personalization!
  • Freely Modify Any Of The Rules So You Can Play How You Want!

NOTE: This DLC is for home use only. It has no immediate effects in game!

legal_notice: You may NOT redistribute any content included in this DLC. You may modify any of the content provided in this DLC as you wish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: PC with Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

short_description: Waste Walkers Role Playing Game DLC: This DLC includes all the necessary files to play Waste Walkers as a role playing game with all your friends like other similar tabletop role playing games.
